title: Weird Visual glitch in client.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/q5rC6mx.png

Note: The glitch fixed a few things before I could get it, the screen was black in a few spots and everything was moved down and to the right a bit, most things were invisible like the entire rune/masteries/spells area, and chat was impossible to read, it was all scrunched up.

Just before this happenned I locked in my champion or ban, I can't remember, it is probably easy to guess from the image though. The end screen was the same, but I couldn't capture it.

replies.body: What I usually do is minimize the client and then re-open it.  Has worked for me every time

> [{quoted}](name=I Am Minimi,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VEOFIoTi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-16T23:27:09.922+0000)
>
> What I usually do is minimize the client and then re-open it.  Has worked for me every time

huh, I'll do that if it happens again
There are tons of visual glitches happening in the client in every screen from profiles to champ select. I hope these all get fixed soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Not A Communist,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VEOFIoTi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-16T13:35:21.194+0000)
>
> There are tons of visual glitches happening in the client in every screen from profiles to champ select. I hope these all get fixed soon.

yeah, it would be nice
I get this too sooo much.
